title: Chain Async Functions
description: In this lab, we will explore how to chain asynchronous functions in JavaScript. We will learn how to loop through an array of functions containing asynchronous events and call the next function when each event has completed. By the end of the lab, you will be able to efficiently execute a series of asynchronous operations in a specific order.

meta.title: Chain Async Functions: Mastering Asynchronous JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to efficiently execute a series of asynchronous operations in a specific order using JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, asynchronous, javascript practice, javascript practice online, functions, javascript lab, javascript tutor, async, chaining

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Execution
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
